verses.name: 1 Samuel 9:17
verses.text: And when Samuel saw Saul, the Lord said unto him, Behold the man whom I spake to thee of! this same shall reign over my people.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 9:18
verses.text: Then Saul drew near to Samuel in the gate, and said, Tell me, I pray thee, where the seer’s house is.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 9:19
verses.text: And Samuel answered Saul, and said, I am the seer: go up before me unto the high place; for ye shall eat with me to day, and to morrow I will let thee go, and will tell thee all that is in thine heart.
